title: Looking to buy a bat on or bat off Cobb
author: Onward

posts.post_title: Looking to buy a bat on or bat off Cobb
posts.post_content:
Hello,
I have been looking to knockout one of the two Cobbs I still need for my set (I am at 482/520 but a long way to go lol) - i'd like to see what is out there for sale for a bat on or a bat off.  I would like a 1.5 or a 2 (possibly better if the right card/price) and prefer sgc over psa but either is fine - I am not freaked by older labels but look at the card over the grade. 

Also, if I cant find a decent t206, I am also on the look out for a Cobb t205 (in off back) but I can post that in the t205 forum if I dont find the right t206)

I have plenty of references on Tobacco Row if needed as I am just digging in here at net 54. 

Any replies are appreciated.  Thanks!
